entry.title: Conor O'Flynn

personImage.title: Conor O Flynn MCV0469 for website

entry.personShortBio: Conor joined Legatum in 2009, working in various roles before taking up his position as Head of IT
entry.personFullBiography:
Conor Oâ€™Flynn is the Head of IT at Legatum. He has served in various capacities at the firm, including Technical Support Analyst, Senior Technical Analyst and Senior IT Project Manager.

Prior to Legatum, Conor was an IT Support Specialist at Siemens IT Solutions and Sales Executive at Mediasatellite in Ireland.

He holds a Bachelorâ€™s degree in IT Services Management from Cork Institute of Technology and a National Diploma in Information Technology from the Waterford Institute of Technology. He is further certified in CCSP, CISSP and ITIL v3.
